org.deeplearning4j.scaleout.statetracker.hazelcast

Class IterateAndUpdateImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.scaleout.statetracker.hazelcast.IterateAndUpdateImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IterateAndUpdate

    public class IterateAndUpdateImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IterateAndUpdate
    This takes in the accumulator, the update saver, and the ids of the workers and handles iterating and loading over each one of them at a time.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IterateAndUpdateImpl(JobAggregator accumulator, UpdateSaver updateSaver, java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> ids) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void accumulate()
      Accumulates the updates in to a result by iterating over each possible worker and obtaining the mini batch updates for each.
      Job accumulated()
      The accumulated result
